items.title: As AI enters exam rooms, states step up oversight

items.title: Study finds few teens follow pre-bed guidelines, sees minimal effect on sleep
items.description: Sleep guidelines suggest no screens, no exercise, and no food in the hour before bed, but do they work and how many young people follow them?
